resources.string: Here could we find albums in order A-Z,all the albums what app could find on our device.
Here would be the player and would be there a global (toolbar)player
Listed the song(s) <-- marked as favourite(s), or the most played
Artist(s) would be listed here in A-Z or most played
Here could you make new playlist(s) or find it.

to modify the playlists it is needed to read the tracks and ratings from a file. A JSON file and its handling methods (JSONObject, getJSONArray, getJSONObject, getString, getInt) would handle this in the onProgressChanged() method, using the progress variable as a filter.
